GV01rv_03_u:149: RV_03.006.05.1{26} vratā te agne mahato mahāni tava kratvā rodasī ā tatantha
GV01rv_03_u:150: RV_03.006.05.2{26} tvaṃ dūto abhavo jāyamānastvaṃ netā vṛṣabha carṣaṇīnām

GV01rv_03_u:154: RV_03.006.07.2{27} apo yadagna uśadhag vaneṣu hoturmandrasya panayanta devāḥ

GV01rv_03_u:156: RV_03.006.08.2{27} ūmā vā ye suhavāso yajatrā āyemire rathyo agne aśvāḥ

GV01rv_03_u:162: RV_03.007.01.1{01} pra ya āruḥ śitipṛṣṭhasya dhāserā mātarā viviśuḥ sapta? vāṇīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:163: RV_03.007.01.2{01} parikṣitā pitarā saṃ carete pra sarsrāte dīrghamāyuḥ prayakṣe

GV01rv_03_u:166: RV_03.007.03.1{01} ā sīmarohat suyamā bhavantīḥ patiścikitvān rayivid rayīṇām
GV01rv_03_u:167: RV_03.007.03.2{01} pra nīlapṛṣṭho atasasya dhāsestā avāsayat purudhapratīkaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:168: RV_03.007.04.1{01} mahi tvāṣṭramūrjayantīrajuryaṃ stabhūyamānaṃ vahato vahanti
GV01rv_03_u:169: RV_03.007.04.2{01} vyaṅgebhirdidyutānaḥ sadhastha ekāmiva rodasī ā viveśa

GV01rv_03_u:171: RV_03.007.05.2{01} divorucaḥ suruco rocamānā iḷā yeṣāṃ gaṇyā māhinā gīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:172: RV_03.007.06.1{02} uto pitṛbhyāṃ pravidānu ghoṣaṃ maho mahadbhyāmanayanta śūṣam
GV01rv_03_u:173: RV_03.007.06.2{02} ukṣā ha yatra pari dhānamaktoranu svaṃ dhāma jariturvavakṣa
GV01rv_03_u:174: RV_03.007.07.1{02} adhvaryubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ sapta viprāḥ priyaṃ rakṣante nihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ
GV01rv_03_u:175: RV_03.007.07.2{02} prāñco madantyukṣaṇo ajuryā devā devānāmanu hi vratā guḥ

GV01rv_03_u:178: RV_03.007.09.2{02} deva hotarmandrataraścikitvān maho devān rodasī eha vakṣi
GV01rv_03_u:179: RV_03.007.10.1{02} pṛkṣaprayajo draviṇaḥ suvācaḥ suketava uṣaso revadūṣuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:180: RV_03.007.10.2{02} uto cidagne mahinā pṛthivyāḥ kṛtaṃ cidenaḥ saṃ mahe daśasya
GV01rv_03_u:182: RV_03.008.01.1{03} añjanti tvāmadhvare devayanto vanaspate madhunā daivyena
GV01rv_03_u:183: RV_03.008.01.2{03} yadūrdhvastiṣṭhā draviṇeha dhattād yad vā kṣayo māturasyā upasthe
GV01rv_03_u:184: RV_03.008.02.1{03} samiddhasya śrayamāṇaḥ purastād brahma vanvāno ajaraṃ suvīram
GV01rv_03_u:185: RV_03.008.02.2{03} āre asmadamatiṃ bādhamāna ucchrayasva mahate saubhagāya
GV01rv_03_u:186: RV_03.008.03.1{03} ucchrayasva vanaspate varṣman pṛthivyā adhi
GV01rv_03_u:187: RV_03.008.03.2{03} sumitī mīyamāno varco dhā yajñavāhase
GV01rv_03_u:188: RV_03.008.04.1{03} yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:189: RV_03.008.04.2{03} taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya un nayanti svādhyo manasā devayantaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:190: RV_03.008.05.1{03} jāto jāyate sudinatve ahnāṃ samarya ā vidathe vardhamānaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:191: RV_03.008.05.2{03} punanti dhīrā apaso manīṣā devayā vipra udiyarti vācam
GV01rv_03_u:192: RV_03.008.06.1{04} yān vo naro devayanto nimimyurvanaspate svadhitirvā tatakṣa
GV01rv_03_u:193: RV_03.008.06.2{04} te devāsaḥ svaravastasthivāṃsaḥ prajāvadasme didhiṣantu ratnam
GV01rv_03_u:194: RV_03.008.07.1{04} ye vṛkṇāso adhi kṣami nimitāso yatasrucaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:195: RV_03.008.07.2{04} te no vyantu vāryaṃ devatrā kṣetrasādhasaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:196: RV_03.008.08.1{04} ādityā rudrā vasavaḥ sunīthā dyāvākṣāmā pṛthivī antarikṣam
GV01rv_03_u:197: RV_03.008.08.2{04} sajoṣaso yajñamavantu devā ūrdhvaṃ kṛṇvantvadhvarasya ketum
GV01rv_03_u:198: RV_03.008.09.1{04} haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatānāḥ śukrā vasānāḥ svaravo naāguḥ
GV01rv_03_u:199: RV_03.008.09.2{04} unnīyamānāḥ kavibhiḥ purastād devā devānāmapi yanti pāthaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:200: RV_03.008.10.1{04} śṛṅgāṇīvecchṛṅgiṇāṃ saṃ dadṛśre caṣālavantaḥ svaravaḥ pṛthivyām
GV01rv_03_u:201: RV_03.008.10.2{04} vāghadbhirvā vihave śroṣamāṇā asmānavantu pṛtanājyeṣu
GV01rv_03_u:202: RV_03.008.11.1{04} vanaspate śatavalśo vi roha sahasravalśā vi vayaṃ ruhema
GV01rv_03_u:203: RV_03.008.11.2{04} yaṃ tvāmayaṃ svadhitistejamānaḥ praṇināya mahate saubhagāya
GV01rv_03_u:204: RV_03.009.01.1{05} sakhāyastvā vavṛmahe devaṃ martāsa ūtaye
GV01rv_03_u:206: RV_03.009.02.1{05} kāyamāno vanā tvaṃ yan mātṝrajagannapaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:207: RV_03.009.02.2{05} na tat teagne pramṛṣe nivartanaṃ yad dūre sannihābhavaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:208: RV_03.009.03.1{05} ati tṛṣṭaṃ vavakṣithāthaiva sumanā asi
GV01rv_03_u:209: RV_03.009.03.2{05} pra-prānye yanti paryanya āsate yeṣāṃ sakhye asi śritaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:211: RV_03.009.04.2{05} anvīmavindan nicirāso adruho 'psu siṃhamiva śritam
GV01rv_03_u:213: RV_03.009.05.2{05} ainaṃ nayan mātariśvā parāvato devebhyo mathitaṃ pari
GV01rv_03_u:214: RV_03.009.06.1{06} taṃ tvā martā agṛbhṇata devebhyo havyavāhana
GV01rv_03_u:215: RV_03.009.06.2{06} viśvān yadyajñānabhipāsi mānuṣa tava kratvā yaviṣṭhya
GV01rv_03_u:216: RV_03.009.07.1{06} tad bhadraṃ tava daṃsanā pākāya cicchadayati
GV01rv_03_u:217: RV_03.009.07.2{06} tvāṃ yadagne paśavaḥ samāsate samiddhamapiśarvare
GV01rv_03_u:218: RV_03.009.08.1{06} ā juhotā svadhvaraṃ śīraṃ pāvakaśociṣam
GV01rv_03_u:219: RV_03.009.08.2{06} āśuṃ dūtamajiraṃ pratnamīḍyaṃ śruṣṭī devaṃ saparyata
GV01rv_03_u:220: RV_03.009.09.1{06} trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇyagniṃ triṃśacca devā navacāsaparyan
GV01rv_03_u:221: RV_03.009.09.2{06} aukṣan ghṛtairastṛṇan barhirasmā ādid dhotāraṃ nyasādayanta
GV01rv_03_u:225: RV_03.010.02.2{07} gopā ṛtasya dīdihi sve dame
GV01rv_03_u:226: RV_03.010.03.1{07} sa ghā yaste dadāśati samidhā jātavedase
GV01rv_03_u:227: RV_03.010.03.2{07} so agne dhattesuvīryaṃ sa puṣyati
GV01rv_03_u:230: RV_03.010.05.1{07} pra hotre pūrvyaṃ vaco 'gnaye bharatā bṛhat
GV01rv_03_u:231: RV_03.010.05.2{07} vipāṃ jyotīṃṣi bibhrate na vedhase

GV01rv_03_u:234: RV_03.010.07.1{08} agne yajiṣṭho adhvare devān devayate yaja
GV01rv_03_u:236: RV_03.010.08.1{08} sa naḥ pāvaka dīdihi dyumadasme suvīryam
GV01rv_03_u:238: RV_03.010.09.1{08} taṃ tvā viprā vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate
GV01rv_03_u:242: RV_03.011.02.1{09} sa havyavāḷ amartya uśig dūtas canohitaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:244: RV_03.011.03.1{09} agnirdhiyā sa cetati keturyajñasya pūrvyaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:246: RV_03.011.04.1{09} agniṃ sūnuṃ sanaśrutaṃ sahaso jātavedasam

GV01rv_03_u:256: RV_03.011.09.1{10} agne viśvāni vāryā vājeṣu saniṣāmahe
GV01rv_03_u:258: RV_03.012.01.1{11} indrāgnī ā gataṃ sutaṃ gīrbhirnabho vareṇyam

GV01rv_03_u:274: RV_03.012.09.1{12} indrāgnī rocanā divaḥ pari vājeṣu bhūṣathaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:277: RV_03.013.01.2{13} gamad devebhirāsa no yajiṣṭho barhirā sadat
GV01rv_03_u:278: RV_03.013.02.1{13} ṛtāvā yasya rodasī dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ

GV01rv_03_u:281: RV_03.013.03.2{13} agniṃ taṃ vo duvasyata dātā yo vanitā magham
GV01rv_03_u:282: RV_03.013.04.1{13} sa naḥ śarmāṇi vītaye 'gniryachatu śantamā
GV01rv_03_u:283: RV_03.013.04.2{13} yato naḥpruṣṇavad vasu divi kṣitibhyo apsvā

GV01rv_03_u:286: RV_03.013.06.1{13} uta no brahmannaviṣa uktheṣu devahūtamaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:288: RV_03.013.07.1{13} nū no rāsva sahasravat tokavat puṣṭimad vasu
GV01rv_03_u:290: RV_03.014.01.1{14} ā hotā mandro vidathānyasthāt satyo yajvā kavitamaḥ savedhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:291: RV_03.014.01.2{14} vidyudrathaḥ sahasas putro agniḥ śociṣkeśaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pājo aśret
GV01rv_03_u:292: RV_03.014.02.1{14} ayāmi te namauktiṃ juṣasva ṛtāvastubhyaṃ cetate sahasvaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:293: RV_03.014.02.2{14} vidvānā vakṣi viduṣo ni ṣatsi madhya ā barhirūtaye yajatra
GV01rv_03_u:294: RV_03.014.03.1{14} dravatāṃ ta uṣasā vājayantī agne vātasya pathyābhiracha

GV01rv_03_u:298: RV_03.014.05.1{14} vayaṃ te adya rarimā hi kāmamuttānahastā namasopasadya
GV01rv_03_u:299: RV_03.014.05.2{14} yajiṣṭhena manasā yakṣi devānasredhatā manmanā vipro agne
GV01rv_03_u:300: RV_03.014.06.1{14} tvad dhi putra sahaso vi pūrvīrdevasya yantyūtayo vi vājāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:301: RV_03.014.06.2{14} tvaṃ dehi sahasriṇaṃ rayiṃ no 'drogheṇa vacasā satyamagne
GV01rv_03_u:302: RV_03.014.07.1{14} tubhyaṃ dakṣa kavikrato yānīmā deva martāso adhvare akarma
GV01rv_03_u:303: RV_03.014.07.2{14} tvaṃ viśvasya surathasya bodhi sarvaṃ tadagne amṛta svadeha
GV01rv_03_u:304: RV_03.015.01.1{15} vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucāno bādhasva dviṣo rakṣaso amīvāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:305: RV_03.015.01.2{15} suśarmaṇo bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syāmagnerahaṃ suhavasya praṇītau

GV01rv_03_u:307: RV_03.015.02.2{15} janmeva nityaṃ tanayaṃ juṣasva stomaṃ me agne tanvā sujāta
GV01rv_03_u:308: RV_03.015.03.1{15} tvaṃ nṛcakṣā vṛṣabhānu pūrvīḥ kṛṣṇāsvagne aruṣo vibhāhi
GV01rv_03_u:309: RV_03.015.03.2{15} vaso neṣi ca parṣi cātyaṃhaḥ kṛdhī no rāya uśijo yaviṣṭha
GV01rv_03_u:310: RV_03.015.04.1{15} aṣāḷho agne vṛṣabho didīhi puro viśvāḥ saubhagā saṃjigīvān
GV01rv_03_u:311: RV_03.015.04.2{15} yajñasya netā prathamasya pāyorjātavedo bṛhataḥ supraṇīte
GV01rv_03_u:312: RV_03.015.05.1{15} achidrā śarma jaritaḥ purūṇi devānachā dīdyānaḥ sumedhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:313: RV_03.015.05.2{15} ratho na sasnirabhi vakṣi vājama>gne tvaṃ rodasīnaḥ sumeke
GV01rv_03_u:314: RV_03.015.06.1{15} pra pīpaya vṛṣabha jinva vājānagne tvaṃ rodasī naḥ sudoghe
GV01rv_03_u:315: RV_03.015.06.2{15} devebhirdeva surucā rucāno mā no martasya durmatiḥ pari ṣṭhāt
GV01rv_03_u:318: RV_03.016.01.2{16} rāya īśe svapatyasya gomata īśe vṛtrahathānām
GV01rv_03_u:319: RV_03.016.02.1{16} imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatā vṛdhaṃ yasmin rāyaḥ śevṛdhāsaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:320: RV_03.016.02.2{16} abhi ye santi pṛtanāsu dūḍhyo viśvāhā śatrumādabhuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:321: RV_03.016.03.1{16} sa tvaṃ no rāyaḥ śiśīhi mīḍhvo agne suviryasya
GV01rv_03_u:323: RV_03.016.04.1{16} cakriryo viśvā bhuvanābhi sāsahiścakrirdeveṣvā duvaḥ

GV01rv_03_u:325: RV_03.016.05.1{16} mā no agne 'mataye māvīratāyai rīradhaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:326: RV_03.016.05.2{16} māgotāyai sahasas putra mā nide 'pa dveṣāṃsyā kṛdhi
GV01rv_03_u:327: RV_03.016.06.1{16} śagdhi vājasya subhaga prajāvato 'gne bṛhato adhvare
GV01rv_03_u:328: RV_03.016.06.2{16} saṃrāyā bhūyasā sṛja mayobhunā tuvidyumna yaśasvatā
GV01rv_03_u:329: RV_03.017.01.1{17} samidhyamānaḥ prathamānu dharmā samaktubhirajyate viśvavāraḥ
GV01rv_03_u:330: RV_03.017.01.2{17} śociṣkeśo ghṛtanirṇik pāvakaḥ suyajño agniryajathāya devān
GV01rv_03_u:331: RV_03.017.02.1{17} yathāyajo hotramagne pṛthivyā yathā divo jātavedaścikitvān
GV01rv_03_u:332: RV_03.017.02.2{17} evānena haviṣā yakṣi devān manuṣvad yajñaṃ pra tiremamadya
GV01rv_03_u:333: RV_03.017.03.1{17} trīṇyāyūṃṣi tava jātavedastisra ājānīruṣasaste agne
GV01rv_03_u:334: RV_03.017.03.2{17} tābhirdevānāmavo yakṣi vidvānathā bhava yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ
GV01rv_03_u:335: RV_03.017.04.1{17} agniṃ sudītiṃ sudṛśaṃ gṛṇanto namasyāmastveḍyaṃ jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:336: RV_03.017.04.2{17} tvāṃ dūtamaratiṃ havyavāhaṃ devā akṛṇvannamṛtasya nābhim
GV01rv_03_u:337: RV_03.017.05.1{17} yastvad dhotā pūrvo agne yajīyān dvitā ca sattā svadhayā ca śambhuḥ tasyānu dharma pra yajā cikitvo 'tha no dhā adhvaraṃ
GV01rv_03_u:338: RV_03.018.01.1{18} bhavā no agne sumanā upetau sakheva sakhye pitareva sādhuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:339: RV_03.018.01.2{18} purudruho hi kṣitayo janānāṃ prati pratīcīrdahatādarātīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:340: RV_03.018.02.1{18} tapo śvagne antarānamitrān tapā śaṃsamararuṣaḥ parasya
GV01rv_03_u:341: RV_03.018.02.2{18} tapo vaso cikitāno acittān vi te tiṣṭhantāmajarā ayāsaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:342: RV_03.018.03.1{18} idhmenāgna ichamāno ghṛtena juhomi havyaṃ tarase balāya
GV01rv_03_u:343: RV_03.018.03.2{18} yāvadīśe brahmaṇā vandamāna imāṃ dhiyaṃ śataseyāya devīm
GV01rv_03_u:344: RV_03.018.04.1{18} ucchociṣā sahasas putra stuto bṛhad vayaḥ śaśamāneṣu dhehi
GV01rv_03_u:345: RV_03.018.04.2{18} revadagne viśvāmitreṣu śaṃ yormarmṛjmā te tanvaṃ bhūri kṛtvaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:346: RV_03.018.05.1{18} kṛdhi ratnaṃ susanitardhanānāṃ sa ghedagne bhavasi yat samiddhaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:347: RV_03.018.05.2{18} stoturduroṇe subhagasya revat sṛprā karasnā dadhiṣe vapūṃṣi
GV01rv_03_u:348: RV_03.019.01.1{19} agniṃ hotāraṃ pra vṛṇe miyedhe gṛtsaṃ kaviṃ viśvavidamamūram
GV01rv_03_u:349: RV_03.019.01.2{19} sa no yakṣad devatātā yajīyān rāye vājāya vanatemaghāni
GV01rv_03_u:350: RV_03.019.02.1{19} pra te agne haviṣmatīmiyarmyachā sudyumnāṃ rātinīṃ ghṛtācīm
GV01rv_03_u:352: RV_03.019.03.1{19} sa tejīyasā manasā tvota uta śikṣa svapatyasya śikṣoḥ
GV01rv_03_u:353: RV_03.019.03.2{19} agne rāyo nṛtamasya prabhūtau bhūyāma te suṣṭutayaśca vasvaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:354: RV_03.019.04.1{19} bhūrīṇi hi tve dadhire anīkāgne devasya yajyavo janāsaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:355: RV_03.019.04.2{19} sa ā vaha devatātiṃ yaviṣṭha śardho yadadya divyaṃyajāsi
GV01rv_03_u:356: RV_03.019.05.1{19} yat tvā hotāramanajan miyedhe niṣādayanto yajathāya devāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:357: RV_03.019.05.2{19} sa tvaṃ no agne 'viteha bodhyadhi śravāṃsi dhehi nastanūṣu
GV01rv_03_u:358: RV_03.020.01.1{20} agnimuṣasamaśvinā dadhikrāṃ vyuṣṭiṣu havate vahnirukthaiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:359: RV_03.020.01.2{20} sujyotiṣo naḥ śṛṇvantu devāḥ sajoṣaso adhvaraṃ vāvaśānāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:360: RV_03.020.02.1{20} agne trī te vājinā trī ṣadhasthā tisraste jihvā ṛtajāta pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:361: RV_03.020.02.2{20} tisra u te tanvo devavātāstābhirnaḥ pāhi giro aprayuchan
GV01rv_03_u:362: RV_03.020.03.1{20} agne bhūrīṇi tava jātavedo deva svadhāvo 'mṛtasya nāma
GV01rv_03_u:363: RV_03.020.03.2{20} yāśca māyā māyināṃ viśvaminva tve pūrvīḥ sandadhuḥpṛṣṭabandho
GV01rv_03_u:364: RV_03.020.04.1{20} agnirnetā bhaga iva kṣitīnāṃ daivīnāṃ deva ṛtupā ṛtāvā
GV01rv_03_u:365: RV_03.020.04.2{20} sa vṛtrahā sanayo viśvavedāḥ parṣad viśvāti duritā gṛṇantam
GV01rv_03_u:366: RV_03.020.05.1{20} dadahikrāmagnimuṣasaṃ ca devīṃ bṛhaspatiṃ savitāraṃ cadevam
GV01rv_03_u:367: RV_03.020.05.2{20} aśvinā mitrāvaruṇā bhagaṃ ca vasūn rudrānādityāniha huve
GV01rv_03_u:368: RV_03.021.01.1{21} imaṃ no yajñamamṛteṣu dhehīmā havyā jātavedo juṣasva
GV01rv_03_u:369: RV_03.021.01.2{21} stokānāmagne medaso ghṛtasya hotaḥ prāśāna prathamo niṣadya
GV01rv_03_u:370: RV_03.021.02.1{21} ghṛtavantaḥ pāvaka te stokā ścotanti medasaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:371: RV_03.021.02.2{21} svadharman devavītaye śreṣṭhaṃ no dhehi vāryam
GV01rv_03_u:372: RV_03.021.03.1{21} tubhyaṃ stokā ghṛtaścuto 'gne viprāya santya
GV01rv_03_u:373: RV_03.021.03.2{21} ṛṣiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ samidhyase yajñasya prāvitā bhava
GV01rv_03_u:374: RV_03.021.04.1{21} tubhyaṃ ścotantyadhrigo śacīva stokāso agne medaso ghṛtasya
GV01rv_03_u:375: RV_03.021.04.2{21} kaviśasto bṛhatā bhānunāgā havyā juṣasva medhira
GV01rv_03_u:376: RV_03.021.05.1{21} ojiṣṭhaṃ te madhyato meda udbhṛtaṃ pra te vayaṃ dadāmahe
GV01rv_03_u:377: RV_03.021.05.2{21} ścotanti te vaso stokā adhi tvaci prati tān devaśo vihi
GV01rv_03_u:378: RV_03.022.01.1{22} ayaṃ so agniryasmin somamindraḥ sutaṃ dadhe jaṭhare vāvaśānaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:379: RV_03.022.01.2{22} sahasriṇaṃ vājamatyaṃ na saptiṃ sasavān san stūyase jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:380: RV_03.022.02.1{22} agne yat te divi varcaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yadoṣadhīṣvapsvā yajatra
GV01rv_03_u:381: RV_03.022.02.2{22} yenāntarikṣamurvātatantha tveṣaḥ sa bhānurarṇavo nṛcakṣāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:382: RV_03.022.03.1{22} agne divo arṇamachā jigāsyachā devānūciṣe dhiṣṇyāye
GV01rv_03_u:383: RV_03.022.03.2{22} yā rocane parastāt sūryasya yāścāvastādupatiṣṭhaṇta āpaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:387: RV_03.023.01.1{23} nirmathitaḥ sudhita ā sadhasthe yuvā kaviradhvarasya praṇetā
GV01rv_03_u:388: RV_03.023.01.2{23} jūryatsvagnirajaro vaneṣvatrā dadhe amṛtaṃ jātavedāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:389: RV_03.023.02.1{23} amanthiṣṭāṃ bhāratā revadagniṃ devaśravā devavātaḥ sudakṣam
GV01rv_03_u:390: RV_03.023.02.2{23} agne vi paśya bṛhatābhi rāyeṣāṃ no netā bhavatādanu dyūn
GV01rv_03_u:391: RV_03.023.03.1{23} daśa kṣipaḥ pūrvyaṃ sīmajījanan sujātaṃ mātṛṣu priyam
GV01rv_03_u:392: RV_03.023.03.2{23} agniṃ stuhi daivavātaṃ devaśravo yo janānāmasad vaśī
GV01rv_03_u:393: RV_03.023.04.1{23} ni tvā dadhe vara ā pṛthivyā iḷāyās pade sudinatve ahnām
GV01rv_03_u:394: RV_03.023.04.2{23} dṛṣadvatyāṃ mānuṣa āpayāyāṃ sarasvatyāṃ revadagnedidīhi
GV01rv_03_u:398: RV_03.024.02.1{24} agna iḷā samidhyase vītihotro amartyaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:400: RV_03.024.03.1{24} agne dyumnena jāgṛve sahasaḥ sūnavāhuta
GV01rv_03_u:405: RV_03.024.05.1{24} agne dā dāśuṣe rayiṃ vīravantaṃ parīṇasam
GV01rv_03_u:407: RV_03.025.01.1{25} a>gne divaḥ sūnurasi pracetāstanā pṛthivyā uta viśvavedāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:409: RV_03.025.02.1{25} agniḥ sanoti vīryāṇi vidvān sanoti vājamamṛtāya bhūṣan
GV01rv_03_u:410: RV_03.025.02.2{25} sa no devāneha vahā purukṣo
GV01rv_03_u:411: RV_03.025.03.1{25} agnirdyāvāpṛthivī viśvajanye ā bhāti devī amṛte amūraḥ
GV01rv_03_u:413: RV_03.025.04.1{25} agna indraśca dāśuṣo durone sutāvato yajñamihopa yātam
GV01rv_03_u:415: RV_03.025.05.1{25} agne apāṃ samidhyase duroṇe nityaḥ sūno sahaso jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:417: RV_03.026.01.1{26} vaiśvānaraṃ manasāgniṃ nicāyyā haviṣmanto anuṣatyaṃ svarvidam
GV01rv_03_u:418: RV_03.026.01.2{26} sudānuṃ devaṃ rathiraṃ vasūyavo gīrbhī raṇvaṃkuśikāso havāmahe
GV01rv_03_u:419: RV_03.026.02.1{26} taṃ śubhramagnimavase havāmahe vaiśvānaraṃ mātariśvānamukthyam
GV01rv_03_u:420: RV_03.026.02.2{26} bṛhaspatiṃ manuṣo devatātaye vipraṃ śrotāramatithiṃ raghuṣyadam
GV01rv_03_u:421: RV_03.026.03.1{26} aśvo na krandañ janibhiḥ samidhyate vaiśvānaraḥ kuśikebhiryuge-yuge
GV01rv_03_u:422: RV_03.026.03.2{26} sa no agniḥ suvīryaṃ svaśvyaṃ dadhātu ratnamamṛteṣu jāgṛviḥ
GV01rv_03_u:423: RV_03.026.04.1{26} pra yantu vājāstaviṣībhiragnayaḥ śubhe sammiṣlāḥ pṛṣatīrayukṣata
GV01rv_03_u:424: RV_03.026.04.2{26} bṛhadukṣo maruto viśvavedasaḥ pra vepayantiparvatānadābhyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:425: RV_03.026.05.1{26} agniśriyo maruto viśvakṛṣṭaya ā tveṣamugramava īmahe vayam
GV01rv_03_u:426: RV_03.026.05.2{26} te svānino rudriyā varṣanirṇijaḥ siṃhā na heṣakratavaḥ sudānavaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:427: RV_03.026.06.1{27} vrātaṃ-vrātaṃ gaṇaṃ-gaṇaṃ suśastibhiragnerbhāmaṃ marutāmoja īmahe
GV01rv_03_u:428: RV_03.026.06.2{27} pṛṣadaśvāso anavabhrarādhaso gantāro yajñaṃ vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:429: RV_03.026.07.1{27} agnirasmi janmanā jātavedā ghṛtaṃ me cakṣuramṛtaṃ ma āsan
GV01rv_03_u:430: RV_03.026.07.2{27} arkastridhātū rajaso vimāno 'jasro gharmo havirasmi nāma
GV01rv_03_u:431: RV_03.026.08.1{27} tribhiḥ pavitrairapupod dhyarkaṃ hṛdā matiṃ jyotiranu prajānan
GV01rv_03_u:432: RV_03.026.08.2{27} varṣiṣṭhaṃ ratnamakṛta svadhābhirādid dyāvāpṛthivī paryapaśyat
GV01rv_03_u:434: RV_03.026.09.2{27} meḷiṃ madantaṃ pitrorupasthe taṃ rodasī pipṛtaṃ satyavācam
GV01rv_03_u:435: RV_03.027.01.1{28} pra vo vājā abhidyavo haviṣmanto ghṛtācyā
GV01rv_03_u:437: RV_03.027.02.1{28} īḷe agniṃ vipaścitaṃ girā yajñasya sādhanam
GV01rv_03_u:439: RV_03.027.03.1{28} agne śakema te vayaṃ yamaṃ devasya vājinaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:445: RV_03.027.06.1{29} taṃ sabādho yatasruca itthā dhiyā yajñavantaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:447: RV_03.027.07.1{29} hotā devo amartyaḥ purastādeti māyayā
GV01rv_03_u:449: RV_03.027.08.1{29} vājī vājeṣu dhīyate 'dhvareṣu pra ṇīyate
GV01rv_03_u:451: RV_03.027.09.1{29} dhiyā cakre vareṇyo bhūtānāṃ garbhamā dadhe
GV01rv_03_u:453: RV_03.027.10.1{29} ni tvā dadhe vareṇyaṃ dakṣasyeḷā sahaskṛta
GV01rv_03_u:455: RV_03.027.11.1{30} agniṃ yanturamapturam ṛtasya yoge vanuṣaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:462: RV_03.027.14.1{30} vṛṣo agniḥ samidhyate 'śvo na devavāhanaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:464: RV_03.027.15.1{30} vṛṣaṇaṃ tvā vayaṃ vṛṣan vṛṣaṇaḥ samidhīmahi
GV01rv_03_u:466: RV_03.028.01.1{31} agne juṣasva no haviḥ puroḷāśaṃ jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:468: RV_03.028.02.1{31} puroḷā agne pacatastubhyaṃ vā ghā pariṣkṛtaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:472: RV_03.028.04.1{31} mādhyandine savane jātavedaḥ puroḷāśamiha kave juṣasva
GV01rv_03_u:473: RV_03.028.04.2{31} agne yahvasya tava bhāgadheyaṃ na pra minanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:474: RV_03.028.05.1{31} agne tṛtīye savane hi kāniṣaḥ puroḷāśaṃ sahasaḥ sūnavāhutam
GV01rv_03_u:475: RV_03.028.05.2{31} athā deveṣvadhvaraṃ vipanyayā dhā ratnavantamamṛteṣu jāgṛvim
GV01rv_03_u:476: RV_03.028.06.1{31} agne vṛdhāna āhutiṃ puroḷāśaṃ jātavedaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:479: RV_03.029.01.2{32} etāṃ viśpatnīmā bharāgniṃ manthāma pūrvathā
GV01rv_03_u:480: RV_03.029.02.1{32} araṇyornihito jātavedā garbha iva sudhito garbhiṇīṣu
GV01rv_03_u:482: RV_03.029.03.1{32} uttānāyāmava bharā cikitvān sadyaḥ pravītā vṛṣaṇaṃ jajāna
GV01rv_03_u:483: RV_03.029.03.2{32} aruṣastūpo ruśadasya pāja iḷāyās putro vayune 'janiṣṭa
GV01rv_03_u:484: RV_03.029.04.1{32} iḷāyāstvā pade vayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā adhi
GV01rv_03_u:485: RV_03.029.04.2{32} jātavedo ni dhīmahyagne havyāya voḷhave
GV01rv_03_u:486: RV_03.029.05.1{32} manthatā naraḥ kavimadvayantaṃ pracetasamamṛtaṃ supratīkam
GV01rv_03_u:487: RV_03.029.05.2{32} yajñasya ketuṃ prathamaṃ purastādagniṃ naro janayatā suśevam
GV01rv_03_u:488: RV_03.029.06.1{33} yadī manthanti bāhubhirvi rocate 'śvo na vājyaruṣo vaneṣvā
GV01rv_03_u:489: RV_03.029.06.2{33} citro na yāmannaśvinoranivṛtaḥ pari vṛṇaktyaśmanastṛṇā dahan
GV01rv_03_u:490: RV_03.029.07.1{33} jāto agnī rocate cekitāno vājī vipraḥ kaviśastaḥ sudānuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:491: RV_03.029.07.2{33} yaṃ devāsa īḍyaṃ viśvavidaṃ havyavāhamadadhuradhvareṣu
GV01rv_03_u:492: RV_03.029.08.1{33} sīda hotaḥ sva u loke cikitvān sādayā yajñaṃ sukṛtasya yonau
GV01rv_03_u:493: RV_03.029.08.2{33} devāvīrdevān haviṣā yajāsyagne bṛhad yajamāne vayo dhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:494: RV_03.029.09.1{33} kṛṇota dhūmaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ sakhāyo 'sredhanta itana vājamacha
GV01rv_03_u:495: RV_03.029.09.2{33} ayamagniḥ pṛtanāṣāṭ suvīro yena devāso asahanta dasyūn
GV01rv_03_u:496: RV_03.029.10.1{33} ayaṃ te yonirṛtviyo yato jāto arocathāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:497: RV_03.029.10.2{33} taṃ jānannagna ā sīdāthā no vardhayā giraḥ
GV01rv_03_u:498: RV_03.029.11.1{34} tanūnapāducyate garbha āsuro narāśaṃso bhavati yad vijāyate
GV01rv_03_u:499: RV_03.029.11.2{34} mātariśvā yadamimīta mātari vātasya sargo abhavatsarīmaṇi
GV01rv_03_u:500: RV_03.029.12.1{34} sunirmathā nirmathitaḥ sunidhā nihitaḥ kaviḥ
GV01rv_03_u:501: RV_03.029.12.2{34} agne svadhvarā kṛṇu devān devayate yaja
GV01rv_03_u:503: RV_03.029.13.2{34} daśa svasāro agruvaḥ samīcīḥ pumāṃsaṃ jātamabhi saṃ rabhante
GV01rv_03_u:504: RV_03.029.14.1{34} pra saptahotā sanakādarocata māturupasthe yadaśocadūdhani
GV01rv_03_u:505: RV_03.029.14.2{34} na ni miṣati suraṇo dive-dive yadasurasya jaṭharādajāyata
GV01rv_03_u:506: RV_03.029.15.1{34} amitrāyudho marutāmiva prayāḥ prathamajā brahmaṇo viśvamid viduḥ
GV01rv_03_u:507: RV_03.029.15.2{34} dyumnavad brahma kuśikāsa erira eka-eko dame agniṃ samīdhire
GV01rv_03_u:508: RV_03.029.16.1{34} yadadya tvā prayati yajñe asmin hotaścikitvo 'vṛṇīmahīha
GV01rv_03_u:509: RV_03.029.16.2{34} dhruvamayā dhruvamutāśamiṣṭhāḥ prajānan vidvānupa yāhi somam
GV01rv_03_u:510: RV_03.030.01.1{01} ichanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ sunvanti somaṃ dadhati prayāṃsi
GV01rv_03_u:511: RV_03.030.01.2{01} titikṣante abhiśastiṃ janānāmindra tvadā kaścana hi praketaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:512: RV_03.030.02.1{01} na te dūre paramā cid rajāṃsyā tu pra yāhi harivo haribhyām
GV01rv_03_u:513: RV_03.030.02.2{01} sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā yuktā grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau
GV01rv_03_u:514: RV_03.030.03.1{01} indraḥ suśipro maghavā tarutro mahāvrātastuvikūrmirṛghāvān
GV01rv_03_u:515: RV_03.030.03.2{01} yadugro dhā bādhito martyeṣu kva tyā te vṛṣabha vīryāṇi
GV01rv_03_u:516: RV_03.030.04.1{01} tvaṃ hi ṣmā cyāvayannacyutānyeko vṛtrā carasi jighnamānaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:517: RV_03.030.04.2{01} tava dyāvāpṛthivī parvatāso 'nu vratāya nimiteva tasthuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:518: RV_03.030.05.1{01} utābhaye puruhūta śravobhireko dṛḷhamavado vṛtrahā san
GV01rv_03_u:519: RV_03.030.05.2{01} ime cidindra rodasī apāre yat saṃgṛbhṇā maghavan kāśirit te
GV01rv_03_u:520: RV_03.030.06.1{02} pra sū ta indra pravatā haribhyāṃ pra te vajraḥ pramṛṇannetu śatrūn
GV01rv_03_u:521: RV_03.030.06.2{02} jahi pratīco anūcaḥ parāco viśvaṃ satyaṃkṛṇuhi viṣṭamastu
GV01rv_03_u:522: RV_03.030.07.1{02} yasmai dhāyuradadhā martyāyābhaktaṃ cid bhajate gehyaṃ saḥ
GV01rv_03_u:523: RV_03.030.07.2{02} bhadrā ta indra sumatirghṛtācī sahasradānā puruhūta rātiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:524: RV_03.030.08.1{02} sahadānuṃ puruhūta kṣiyantamahastamindra saṃ piṇak kuṇārum
GV01rv_03_u:525: RV_03.030.08.2{02} abhi vṛtraṃ vardhamānaṃ piyārumapādamindra tavasā jaghantha
GV01rv_03_u:526: RV_03.030.09.1{02} ni sāmanāmiṣirāmindra bhūmiṃ mahīmapārāṃ sadane sasattha
GV01rv_03_u:527: RV_03.030.09.2{02} astabhnād dyāṃ vṛṣabho antarikṣamarṣantvāpastvayeha prasūtāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:528: RV_03.030.10.1{02} alātṛṇo vala indra vrajo goḥ purā hantorbhayamāno vyāra
GV01rv_03_u:529: RV_03.030.10.2{02} sugān patho akṛṇon niraje gāḥ prāvan vāṇīḥ puruhūtaṃ dhamantīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:530: RV_03.030.11.1{03} eko dve vasumatī samīcī indra ā paprau pṛthivīmuta dyām
GV01rv_03_u:531: RV_03.030.11.2{03} utāntarikṣādabhi naḥ samīka iṣo rathīḥ sayujaḥ śūra vājān
GV01rv_03_u:532: RV_03.030.12.1{03} diśaḥ sūryo na mināti pradiṣṭā dive-dive haryaśvaprasūtāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:533: RV_03.030.12.2{03} saṃ yadānaḷ adhvana ādidaśvairvimocanaṃ kṛṇute tat tvasya
GV01rv_03_u:534: RV_03.030.13.1{03} didṛkṣanta uṣaso yāmannaktorvivasvatyā mahi citramanīkam
GV01rv_03_u:535: RV_03.030.13.2{03} viśve jānanti mahinā yadāgādindrasya karma sukṛtāpurūṇi
GV01rv_03_u:536: RV_03.030.14.1{03} mahi jyotirnihitaṃ vakṣaṇāsvāmā pakvaṃ carati bibhratī gauḥ
GV01rv_03_u:537: RV_03.030.14.2{03} viśvaṃ svādma sambhṛtamusriyāyāṃ yat sīmindro adadhād bhojanāya
GV01rv_03_u:538: RV_03.030.15.1{03} indra dṛhya yāmakośā abhūvan yajñāya śikṣa gṛṇate sakhibhyaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:539: RV_03.030.15.2{03} durmāyavo durevā martyāso niṣaṅgiṇo ripavo hantvāsaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:540: RV_03.030.16.1{04} saṃ ghoṣaḥ śṛṇve 'vamairamitrairjahī nyeṣvaśaniṃ tapiṣṭhām
GV01rv_03_u:541: RV_03.030.16.2{04} vṛścemadhastād vi rujā sahasva jahi rakṣo maghavan randhayasva
GV01rv_03_u:542: RV_03.030.17.1{04} ud vṛha rakṣaḥ sahamūlamindra vṛścā madhyaṃ pratyagraṃśṛṇīhi
GV01rv_03_u:543: RV_03.030.17.2{04} ā kīvataḥ salalūkaṃ cakartha brahmadviṣe tapuṣiṃ hetimasya
GV01rv_03_u:544: RV_03.030.18.1{04} svastaye vājibhiśca praṇetaḥ saṃ yan mahīriṣa āsatsipūrvīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:545: RV_03.030.18.2{04} rāyo vantāro bṛhataḥ syāmāsme astu bhaga indraprajāvān
GV01rv_03_u:546: RV_03.030.19.1{04} ā no bhara bhagamindra dyumantaṃ ni te deṣṇasya dhīmahi prareke
GV01rv_03_u:547: RV_03.030.19.2{04} ūrva iva paprathe kāmo asme tamā pṛṇa vasupate vasūnām
GV01rv_03_u:548: RV_03.030.20.1{04} imaṃ kāmaṃ mandayā gobhiraśvaiścandravatā rādhasā paprathaśca
GV01rv_03_u:549: RV_03.030.20.2{04} svaryavo matibhistubhyaṃ viprā indrāya vāhaḥkuśikāso akran
GV01rv_03_u:550: RV_03.030.21.1{04} ā no gotrā dardṛhi gopate gāḥ samasmabhyaṃ sanayo yantu vājāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:551: RV_03.030.21.2{04} divakṣā asi vṛṣabha satyaśuṣmo 'smabhyaṃ su maghavan bodhi godāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:552: RV_03.030.22.1{04} śunaṃ huvema maghavānamindramasmin bhare nṛtamaṃ vājasātau
GV01rv_03_u:553: RV_03.030.22.2{04} śṛṇvantamugramūtaye samatsu ghnantaṃ vṛtrāṇi saṃjitaṃ dhanānām
GV01rv_03_u:554: RV_03.031.01.1{05} śāsad vahnirduhiturnaptyaṃ gād vidvān ṛtasya dīdhitiṃsaparyan
GV01rv_03_u:555: RV_03.031.01.2{05} pitā yatra duhituḥ sekam ṛñjan saṃ śagmyena manasā dadhanve
GV01rv_03_u:556: RV_03.031.02.1{05} na jāmaye tānvo rikthamāraik cakāra garbhaṃ saniturnidhānam
GV01rv_03_u:557: RV_03.031.02.2{05} yadī mātaro janayanta vahnimanyaḥ kartā sukṛtoranya ṛndhan
GV01rv_03_u:558: RV_03.031.03.1{05} agnirjajñe juhvā rejamāno mahas putrānaruṣasya prayakṣe
GV01rv_03_u:559: RV_03.031.03.2{05} mahān garbho mahyā jātameṣāṃ mahī pravṛd dharyaśvasya yajñaiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:560: RV_03.031.04.1{05} abhi jaitrīrasacanta spṛdhānaṃ mahi jyotistamaso nirajānan
GV01rv_03_u:561: RV_03.031.04.2{05} taṃ jānatīḥ pratyudāyannuṣāsaḥ patirgavāmabhavadeka indraḥ
GV01rv_03_u:562: RV_03.031.05.1{05} vīḷau satīrabhi dhīrā atṛndan prācāhinvan manasā saptaviprāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:563: RV_03.031.05.2{05} viśvāmavindan pathyām ṛtasya prajānannit tānamasā viveśa
GV01rv_03_u:564: RV_03.031.06.1{06} vidad yadī saramā rugṇamadrermahi pāthaḥ pūrvyaṃ sadhryak kaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:565: RV_03.031.06.2{06} agraṃ nayat supadyakṣarāṇāmachā ravaṃ prathamā jānatī gāt
GV01rv_03_u:566: RV_03.031.07.1{06} agachadu vipratamaḥ sakhīyannasūdayat sukṛte garbhamadriḥ
GV01rv_03_u:567: RV_03.031.07.2{06} sasāna maryo yuvabhirmakhasyannathābhavadaṅgirāḥ sadyo arcan
GV01rv_03_u:568: RV_03.031.08.1{06} sataḥ-sataḥ pratimānaṃ purobhūrviśvā veda janimā hanti śuṣṇam
GV01rv_03_u:569: RV_03.031.08.2{06} pra ṇo divaḥ padavīrgavyurarcan sakhā sakhīnramuñcan niravadyāt
GV01rv_03_u:570: RV_03.031.09.1{06} ni gavyatā manasā sedurarkaiḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum
GV01rv_03_u:571: RV_03.031.09.2{06} idaṃ cin nu sadanaṃ bhūryeṣāṃ yena māsānasiṣāsannṛtena
GV01rv_03_u:572: RV_03.031.10.1{06} sampaśyamānā amadannabhi svaṃ payaḥ pratnasya retaso dughānāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:573: RV_03.031.10.2{06} vi rodasī atapad ghoṣa eṣāṃ jāte niṣṭhāmadadhurgoṣu vīrān
GV01rv_03_u:574: RV_03.031.11.1{07} sa jātebhirvṛtrahā sedu havyairudusriyā asṛjadindro arkaiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:575: RV_03.031.11.2{07} urūcyasmai ghṛtavad bharantī madhu svādma duduhe jenyā gauḥ
GV01rv_03_u:576: RV_03.031.12.1{07} pitre ciccakruḥ sadanaṃ samasmai mahi tviṣīmat sukṛto vihi khyan
GV01rv_03_u:577: RV_03.031.12.2{07} viṣkabhnanta skambhanenā janitrī āsīnā ūrdhvaṃ rabhasaṃ vi minvan
GV01rv_03_u:578: RV_03.031.13.1{07} mahī yadi dhiṣaṇā śiśnathe dhāt sadyovṛdhaṃ vibhvaṃ rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_03_u:579: RV_03.031.13.2{07} giro yasminnanavadyāḥ samīcīrviśvā indrāya taviṣīranuttāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:580: RV_03.031.14.1{07} mahyā te sakhyaṃ vaśmi śaktīrā vṛtraghne niyuto yanti pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:581: RV_03.031.14.2{07} mahi stotramava āganma sūrerasmākaṃ su maghavan bodhi gopāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:582: RV_03.031.15.1{07} mahi kṣetraṃ puru ścandraṃ vividvānādit sakhibhyaścarathaṃ samairat
GV01rv_03_u:583: RV_03.031.15.2{07} indro nṛbhirajanad dīdyānaḥ sākaṃ sūryamuṣasaṃ gātumagnim
GV01rv_03_u:584: RV_03.031.16.1{08} apaścideṣa vibhvo damūnāḥ pra sadhrīcīrasṛjad viśvaścandrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:586: RV_03.031.17.1{08} anu kṛṣṇe vasudhitī jihāte ubhe sūryasya maṃhanā yajatre
GV01rv_03_u:587: RV_03.031.17.2{08} pari yat te mahimānaṃ vṛjadhyai sakhāya indra kāmyā ṛjipyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:588: RV_03.031.18.1{08} patirbhava vṛtrahan sūnṛtānāṃ girāṃ viśvāyurvṛṣabho vayodhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:589: RV_03.031.18.2{08} ā no gahi sakhyebhiḥ śivebhirmahān mahībhirūtibhiḥ saraṇyan
GV01rv_03_u:590: RV_03.031.19.1{08} tamaṅgirasvan namasā saparyan navyaṃ kṛṇomi sanyase purājām
GV01rv_03_u:591: RV_03.031.19.2{08} druho vi yāhi bahulā adevīḥ svaśca no maghavan sātaye dhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:592: RV_03.031.20.1{08} mihaḥ pāvakāḥ pratatā abhūvan svasti naḥ pipṛhi pāramāsām
GV01rv_03_u:593: RV_03.031.20.2{08} indra tvaṃ rathiraḥ pāhi no riṣo makṣū-makṣū kṛṇuhi gojito naḥ
GV01rv_03_u:594: RV_03.031.21.1{08} adediṣṭa vṛtrahā gopatirgā antaḥ kṛṣṇānaruṣairdhāmabhirgāt
GV01rv_03_u:595: RV_03.031.21.2{08} pra sūnṛtā diśamāna ṛtena duraśca viśvā avṛṇodapa svāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:597: RV_03.032.01.1{09} indra somaṃ somapate pibemaṃ mādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ cāru yat te
GV01rv_03_u:598: RV_03.032.01.2{09} prapruthyā śipre maghavannṛjīṣin vimucyā harī ihamādayasva
GV01rv_03_u:599: RV_03.032.02.1{09} gavāśiraṃ manthinamindra śukraṃ pibā somaṃ rarimā te madāya
GV01rv_03_u:600: RV_03.032.02.2{09} brahmakṛtā mārutenā gaṇena sajoṣā rudraistṛpadāvṛṣasva
GV01rv_03_u:601: RV_03.032.03.1{09} ye te śuṣmaṃ ye taviṣīmavardhannarcanta indra marutastaojaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:602: RV_03.032.03.2{09} mādhyandine savane vajrahasta pibā rudrebhiḥ sagaṇaḥ suśipra
GV01rv_03_u:603: RV_03.032.04.1{09} ta in nvasya madhumad vivipra indrasya śardho maruto ya āsan
GV01rv_03_u:605: RV_03.032.05.1{09} manuṣvadindra savanaṃ juṣāṇaḥ pibā somaṃ śaśvate vīryāya
GV01rv_03_u:606: RV_03.032.05.2{09} sa ā vavṛtsva haryaśva yajñaiḥ saraṇyubhirapo arṇā sisarṣi
GV01rv_03_u:607: RV_03.032.06.1{10} tvamapo yad dha vṛtraṃ jaghanvānatyāniva prāsṛjaḥ sartavājau
GV01rv_03_u:608: RV_03.032.06.2{10} śayānamindra carata vadhena vavrivāṃsaṃ pari devīradevam
GV01rv_03_u:609: RV_03.032.07.1{10} yajāma in namasā vṛddhamindraṃ bṛhantam ṛṣvamajaraṃ yuvānam
GV01rv_03_u:610: RV_03.032.07.2{10} yasya priye mamaturyajñiyasya na rodasī mahimānaṃ mamāte
GV01rv_03_u:611: RV_03.032.08.1{10} indrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi vratāni devā na minanti viśve
GV01rv_03_u:612: RV_03.032.08.2{10} dādhāra yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāṃ jajāna sūryamuṣasaṃ sudaṃsāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:613: RV_03.032.09.1{10} adrogha satyaṃ tava tan mahitvaṃ sadyo yajjāto apibo ha somam
GV01rv_03_u:614: RV_03.032.09.2{10} na dyāva indra tavasasta ojo nāhā na māsāḥ śarado varanta
GV01rv_03_u:615: RV_03.032.10.1{10} tvaṃ sadyo apibo jāta indra madāya somaṃ parame vyoman
GV01rv_03_u:616: RV_03.032.10.2{10} yad dha dyāvāpṛthivī āviveṣīrathābhavaḥ pūrvyaḥ kārudhāyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:617: RV_03.032.11.1{11} ahannahiṃ pariśayānamarṇa ojāyamānaṃ tuvijāta tavyān
GV01rv_03_u:618: RV_03.032.11.2{11} na te mahitvamanu bhūdadha dyauryadanyayā sphigyā kṣāmavasthāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:619: RV_03.032.12.1{11} yajño hi ta indra vardhano bhūduta priyaḥ sutasomo miyedhaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:620: RV_03.032.12.2{11} yajñena yajñamava yajñiyaḥ san yajñaste vajramahihatya āvat
GV01rv_03_u:621: RV_03.032.13.1{11} yajñenendramavasā cakre arvāgainaṃ sumnāya navyase vavṛtyām
GV01rv_03_u:622: RV_03.032.13.2{11} ya stomebhirvāvṛdhe pūrvyebhiryo madhyamebhiruta nūtanebhiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:623: RV_03.032.14.1{11} viveṣa yan mā dhiṣaṇā jajāna stavai purā pāryādindramahnaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:624: RV_03.032.14.2{11} aṃhaso yatra pīparad yathā no nāveva yāntamubhaye havante
GV01rv_03_u:625: RV_03.032.15.1{11} āpūrṇo asya kalaśaḥ svāhā sekteva kośaṃ sisice pibadhyai
GV01rv_03_u:626: RV_03.032.15.2{11} samu priyā āvavṛtran madāya pradakṣiṇidabhi somāsaindram
GV01rv_03_u:627: RV_03.032.16.1{11} na tvā gabhīraḥ puruhūta sindhurnādrayaḥ pari ṣanto varanta
GV01rv_03_u:628: RV_03.032.16.2{11} itthā sakhibhya iṣito yadindrā dṛḷhaṃ cidarujo gavyamūrvam
GV01rv_03_u:630: RV_03.033.01.1{12} pra parvatānāmuśatī upasthādaśve iva viṣite hāsamāne
GV01rv_03_u:631: RV_03.033.01.2{12} gāveva śubhre mātarā rihāṇe vipāṭ chutudrī payasājavete
GV01rv_03_u:632: RV_03.033.02.1{12} indreṣite prasavaṃ bhikṣamāṇe achā samudraṃ rathyeva yāthaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:633: RV_03.033.02.2{12} samārāṇe ūrmibhiḥ pinvamāne anyā vāmanyāmapyeti śubhre
GV01rv_03_u:634: RV_03.033.03.1{12} achā sindhuṃ mātṛtamāmayāsaṃ vipāśamurvīṃ subhagāmaganma
GV01rv_03_u:635: RV_03.033.03.2{12} vatsamiva mātarā saṃrihāṇe samānaṃ yonimanu saṃcarantī
GV01rv_03_u:636: RV_03.033.04.1{12} ena vayaṃ payasā pinvamānā anu yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ carantīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:637: RV_03.033.04.2{12} na vartave prasavaḥ sargataktaḥ kiṃyurvipro nadyo johavīti
GV01rv_03_u:638: RV_03.033.05.1{12} ramadhvaṃ me vacase somyāya ṛtāvarīrupa muhūrtamevaiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:639: RV_03.033.05.2{12} pra sindhumachā bṛhatī manīṣāvasyurahve kuśikasya sūnuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:640: RV_03.033.06.1{13} indro asmānaradad vajrabāhurapāhan vṛtraṃ paridhiṃ nadīnām
GV01rv_03_u:641: RV_03.033.06.2{13} devo 'nayat savita supāṇistasya vayaṃ prasave yāma urvīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:642: RV_03.033.07.1{13} pravācyaṃ śaśvadhā vīryaṃ tadindrasya karma yadahiṃvivṛścat
GV01rv_03_u:644: RV_03.033.08.1{13} etad vaco jaritarmāpi mṛṣṭhā ā yat te ghoṣānuttarā yugāni
GV01rv_03_u:645: RV_03.033.08.2{13} uktheṣu kāro prati no juṣasva mā no ni kaḥ puruṣatrā namaste
GV01rv_03_u:646: RV_03.033.09.1{13} o ṣu svasāraḥ kārave śṛṇota yayau vo dūrādanasā rathena
GV01rv_03_u:647: RV_03.033.09.2{13} ni ṣū namadhvaṃ bhavatā supārā adhoakṣāḥ sindhavaḥsrotyābhiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:648: RV_03.033.10.1{13} ā te kāro śṛṇavāmā vacāṃsi yayātha dūrādanasā rathena
GV01rv_03_u:649: RV_03.033.10.2{13} ni te naṃsai pīpyāneva yoṣā maryāyeva kanyā śaśvacai te
GV01rv_03_u:650: RV_03.033.11.1{14} yadaṅga tvā bharatāḥ santareyurgavyan grāma iṣita indrajūtaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:651: RV_03.033.11.2{14} arṣādaha prasavaḥ sargatakta ā vo vṛṇe sumatiṃ yajñiyānām
GV01rv_03_u:652: RV_03.033.12.1{14} atāriṣurbharatā gavyavaḥ samabhakta vipraḥ sumatiṃ nadīnām
GV01rv_03_u:653: RV_03.033.12.2{14} pra pinvadhvamiṣayantīḥ surādhā ā vakṣaṇāḥ pṛṇadhvaṃ yāta śībham
GV01rv_03_u:654: RV_03.033.13.1{14} ud va ūrmiḥ śamyā hantvāpo yoktrāṇi muñcata
GV01rv_03_u:657: RV_03.034.01.2{15} brahmajūtastanvā vāvṛdhāno bhūridātra āpṛṇad rodasī ubhe
GV01rv_03_u:658: RV_03.034.02.1{15} makhasya te taviṣasya pra jūtimiyarmi vācamamṛtāya bhūṣan
GV01rv_03_u:659: RV_03.034.02.2{15} indra kṣitīnāmasi mānuṣīṇāṃ viśāṃ daivīnāmuta pūrvayāvā
GV01rv_03_u:660: RV_03.034.03.1{15} indro vṛtramavṛṇocchardhanītiḥ pra māyināmaminād varpaṇītiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:661: RV_03.034.03.2{15} ahan vyaṃsamuśadhag vaneṣvāvirdhenā akṛṇod rāmyāṇām
GV01rv_03_u:662: RV_03.034.04.1{15} indraḥ svarṣā janayannahāni jigāyośigbhiḥ pṛtanā abhiṣṭiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:664: RV_03.034.04.1{15} indrastujo barhaṇā ā viveśa nṛvad dadhāno naryā purūṇi
GV01rv_03_u:665: RV_03.034.04.2{15} acetayad dhiya imā jaritre premaṃ varṇamatiracchukramāsām
GV01rv_03_u:666: RV_03.034.06.1{16} maho mahāni panayantyasyendrasya karma sukṛtā purūṇi
GV01rv_03_u:667: RV_03.034.06.2{16} vṛjanena vṛjinān saṃ pipeṣa māyābhirdasyūnrabhibhūtyojāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:668: RV_03.034.07.1{16} yudhendro mahnā varivaścakāra devebhyaḥ satpatiścarṣaṇiprāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:669: RV_03.034.07.2{16} vivasvataḥ sadane asya tāni viprā ukthebhiḥ kavayogṛṇanti
GV01rv_03_u:670: RV_03.034.08.1{16} satrāsāhaṃ vareṇyaṃ sahodāṃ sasavāṃsaṃ svarapaśca devīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:671: RV_03.034.08.2{16} sasāna yaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāmindraṃ madantyanu dhīraṇāsaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:672: RV_03.034.09.1{16} sasānātyānuta sūryaṃ sasānendraḥ sasāna purubhojasaṃ gām
GV01rv_03_u:673: RV_03.034.09.2{16} hiraṇyayamuta bhogaṃ sasāna hatvī dasyūn prāryaṃvarṇamāvat
GV01rv_03_u:675: RV_03.034.10.2{16} bibheda valaṃ nunude vivāco 'thābhavad damitadbhikratūnām
GV01rv_03_u:677: RV_03.035.01.1{17} tiṣṭhā harī ratha ā yujyamānā yāhi vāyurna niyuto no acha
GV01rv_03_u:678: RV_03.035.01.2{17} pibāsyandho abhisṛṣṭo asme indra svāhā rarimāte madāya
GV01rv_03_u:679: RV_03.035.02.1{17} upājirā puruhūtāya saptī harī rathasya dhūrṣvā yunajmi
GV01rv_03_u:680: RV_03.035.02.2{17} dravad yathā sambhṛtaṃ viśvataścidupemaṃ yajñamāvahāta indram
GV01rv_03_u:681: RV_03.035.03.1{17} upo nayasva vṛṣaṇā tapuṣpotemava tvaṃ vṛṣabha svadhāvaḥ

GV01rv_03_u:699: RV_03.036.01.2{19} sute-sute vāvṛdhe vardhanebhiryaḥ karmabhirmahadbhiḥ suśruto bhūt

GV01rv_03_u:708: RV_03.036.06.1{20} pra yat sindhavaḥ prasavaṃ yathāyannāpaḥ samudraṃ rathyeva jagmuḥ

GV01rv_03_u:741: RV_03.038.01.1{23} abhi taṣṭeva dīdhayā manīṣāmatyo na vājī sudhuro jihānaḥ

GV01rv_03_u:743: RV_03.038.02.1{23} inota pṛcha janimā kavīnāṃ manodhṛtaḥ sukṛtastakṣata dyām
GV01rv_03_u:744: RV_03.038.02.2{23} imā u te praṇyo vardhamānā manovātā adha nu dharmaṇigman
GV01rv_03_u:745: RV_03.038.03.1{23} ni ṣīmidatra guhyā dadhānā uta kṣatrāya rodasī samañjan
GV01rv_03_u:746: RV_03.038.03.2{23} saṃ mātrābhirmamire yemur urvī antar mahī samṛte dhāyase dhuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:747: RV_03.038.04.1{23} ātiṣṭhantaṃ pari viśve abhūṣañchriyo vasānaścarati svarociḥ
GV01rv_03_u:748: RV_03.038.04.2{23} mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāmā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau
GV01rv_03_u:749: RV_03.038.05.1{23} asūta pūrvo vṛṣabho jyāyānimā asya śurudhaḥ santi pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_03_u:750: RV_03.038.05.2{23} divo napātā vidathasya dhībhiḥ kṣatraṃ rājānā pradivo dadhāthe
GV01rv_03_u:751: RV_03.038.06.1{24} trīṇi rājānā vidathe purūṇi pari viśvāni bhūṣathaḥ sadāṃsi
GV01rv_03_u:752: RV_03.038.06.2{24} apaśyamatra manasā jaganvān vrate gandharvānapi vāyukeśān
GV01rv_03_u:753: RV_03.038.07.1{24} tadin nvasya vṛṣabhasya dhenorā nāmabhirmamire sakmyaṃgoḥ
GV01rv_03_u:754: RV_03.038.07.2{24} anyad-anyadasuryaṃ vasānā ni māyino mamire rūpamasmin

GV01rv_03_u:760: RV_03.039.01.1{25} indraṃ matirhṛda ā vacyamānāchā patiṃ stomataṣṭā jigāti

GV01rv_03_u:765: RV_03.039.03.2{25} vapūṃṣi jātā mithunā sacete tamohanā tapuṣo budhna etā

GV01rv_03_u:777: RV_03.040.01.1{01} indra tvā vṛṣabhaṃ vayaṃ sute some havāmahe

GV01rv_03_u:783: RV_03.040.04.1{01} indra somāḥ sutā ime tava pra yanti satpate
GV01rv_03_u:785: RV_03.040.05.1{01} dadhiṣvā jaṭhare sutaṃ somamindra vareṇyam
GV01rv_03_u:787: RV_03.040.06.1{02} girvaṇaḥ pāhi naḥ sutaṃ madhordhārābhirajyase

GV01rv_03_u:823: RV_03.042.06.1{06} vidmā hi tvā dhanaṃjayaṃ vājeṣu dadhṛṣaṃ kave
GV01rv_03_u:825: RV_03.042.07.1{06} imamindra gavāśiraṃ yavāśiraṃ ca naḥ piba
GV01rv_03_u:827: RV_03.042.08.1{06} tubhyedindra sva okye somaṃ codāmi pītaye
GV01rv_03_u:829: RV_03.042.09.1{06} tvāṃ sutasya pītaye pratnamindra havāmahe
GV01rv_03_u:831: RV_03.043.01.1{07} ā yāhyarvāṃ upa vandhureṣṭhāstavedanu pradivaḥ somapeyam
GV01rv_03_u:832: RV_03.043.01.2{07} priyā sakhāyā vi mucopa barhistvāmime havyavāho havante
GV01rv_03_u:833: RV_03.043.02.1{07} ā yāhi pūrvīrati carṣaṇīrānarya āśiṣa upa no haribhyām
GV01rv_03_u:834: RV_03.043.02.2{07} imā hi tvā mataya stomataṣṭā indra havante sakhyaṃ juṣāṇāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:835: RV_03.043.03.1{07} ā no yajñaṃ namovṛdhaṃ sajoṣā indra deva haribhiryāhi tūyam

GV01rv_03_u:837: RV_03.043.04.1{07} ā ca tvāmetā vṛṣaṇā vahāto harī sakhāyā sudhurā svaṅgā
GV01rv_03_u:838: RV_03.043.04.2{07} dhānāvadindraḥ savanaṃ juṣāṇaḥ sakhā sakhyuḥ śṛṇavad vandanāni

GV01rv_03_u:842: RV_03.043.06.2{07} pra ye dvitā diva ṛñjantyātāḥ susammṛṣṭāso vṛṣabhasya mūrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:843: RV_03.043.07.1{07} indra piba vṛṣadhūtasya vṛṣṇa ā yaṃ te śyena uśate jabhāra

GV01rv_03_u:846: RV_03.044.01.1{08} ayaṃ te astu haryataḥ soma ā haribhiḥ sutaḥ

GV01rv_03_u:855: RV_03.044.05.2{08} apāvṛṇod dharibhiradribhiḥ sutamud gā haribhirājata
GV01rv_03_u:857: RV_03.045.01.2{09} mā tvā kecin ni yaman viṃ na pāśino 'ti dhanveva tānihi
GV01rv_03_u:858: RV_03.045.02.1{09} vṛtrakhādo valaṃrujaḥ purāṃ darmo apāmajaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:859: RV_03.045.02.2{09} sthātā rathasya haryorabhisvara indro dṛḷhā cidārujaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:860: RV_03.045.03.1{09} gambhīrānudadhīnriva kratuṃ puṣyasi gā iva
GV01rv_03_u:861: RV_03.045.03.2{09} pra sugopāyavasaṃ dhenavo yathā hradaṃ kulyā ivāśata
GV01rv_03_u:862: RV_03.045.04.1{09} ā nastujaṃ rayiṃ bharāṃśaṃ na pratijānate
GV01rv_03_u:863: RV_03.045.04.2{09} vṛkṣaṃ pakvaṃ phalamaṅkīva dhūnuhīndra sampāraṇaṃ vasu
GV01rv_03_u:864: RV_03.045.05.1{09} svayurindra svarāḷ asi smaddiṣṭiḥ svayaśastaraḥ
GV01rv_03_u:865: RV_03.045.05.2{09} sa vāvṛdhāna ojasā puruṣṭuta bhavā naḥ suśravastamaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:866: RV_03.046.01.1{10} yudhmasya te vṛṣabhasya svarāja ugrasya yūna sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ
GV01rv_03_u:867: RV_03.046.01.2{10} ajūryato vajriṇo vīryāṇīndra śrutasya mahato mahāni
GV01rv_03_u:868: RV_03.046.02.1{10} mahānasi mahiṣa vṛṣṇyebhirdhanaspṛdugra sahamāno anyān
GV01rv_03_u:869: RV_03.046.02.2{10} eko viśvasya bhuvanasya rājā sa yodhayā ca kṣayayā ca janān
GV01rv_03_u:870: RV_03.046.03.1{10} pra mātrābhī ririce rocamānaḥ pra devebhirviśvato apratītaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:871: RV_03.046.03.2{10} pra majmanā diva indraḥ pṛthivyāḥ prorormaho antarikṣād ṛjīṣī
GV01rv_03_u:872: RV_03.046.04.1{10} uruṃ gabhīraṃ januṣābhyugraṃ viśvavyacasamavataṃ matīnām
GV01rv_03_u:873: RV_03.046.04.2{10} indraṃ somāsaḥ pradivi sutāsaḥ samudraṃ na sravataā viśanti
GV01rv_03_u:874: RV_03.046.05.1{10} yaṃ somamindra pṛthivīdyāvā garbhaṃ na mātā bibhṛtastvāyā
GV01rv_03_u:875: RV_03.046.05.2{10} taṃ te hinvanti tamu te mṛjantyadhvaryavo vṛṣabha pātavā u
GV01rv_03_u:876: RV_03.047.01.1{11} marutvānindra vṛṣabho raṇāya pibā somamanuṣvadhaṃ madāya
GV01rv_03_u:877: RV_03.047.01.2{11} ā siñcasva jaṭhare madhva ūrmiṃ tvaṃ rājāsi pradivaḥ sutānām
GV01rv_03_u:878: RV_03.047.02.1{11} sajoṣā indra sagaṇo marudbhiḥ somaṃ piba vṛtrahā śūra vidvān
GV01rv_03_u:879: RV_03.047.02.2{11} jahi śatrūnrapa mṛdho nudasvāthābhayaṃ kṛṇuhi viśvato naḥ

GV01rv_03_u:1088: RV_03.056.01.1{01} na tā minanti māyino na dhīrā vratā devānāṃ prathamā dhruvāṇi
GV01rv_03_u:1089: RV_03.056.01.2{01} na rodasī adruhā vedyābhirna parvatā niname tasthivāṃsaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1090: RV_03.056.02.1{01} ṣaḍ bhārāneko acaran bibharty ṛtaṃ varṣiṣṭhamupa gāva āguḥ tisro mahīruparāstasthuratyā guhā dve nihitedarśyekā
GV01rv_03_u:1091: RV_03.056.03.1{01} tripājasyo vṛṣabho viśvarūpa uta tryudhā purudha prajāvān
GV01rv_03_u:1092: RV_03.056.03.2{01} tryanīkaḥ patyate māhināvān sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām
GV01rv_03_u:1093: RV_03.056.04.1{01} abhīka āsāṃ padavīrabodhyādityānāmahve cāru nāma
GV01rv_03_u:1094: RV_03.056.04.2{01} āpaścidasmā aramanta devīḥ pṛthag vrajantīḥ pari ṣīmavṛñjan
GV01rv_03_u:1095: RV_03.056.05.1{01} trī ṣadhasthā sindhavastriḥ kavīnāmuta trimātā vidatheṣu samrāṭ
GV01rv_03_u:1096: RV_03.056.05.2{01} ṛtāvarīryoṣaṇāstisro apyāstrirā divo vidathe patyamānāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1097: RV_03.056.06.1{01} trirā divaḥ savitarvāryāṇi dive-diva ā suva trirno ahnaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1098: RV_03.056.06.2{01} tridhātu rāya ā suvā vasūni bhaga trātardhiṣaṇe sātaye dhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1099: RV_03.056.07.1{01} trirā divaḥ savitā soṣavīti rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī
GV01rv_03_u:1100: RV_03.056.07.2{01} āpaścidasya rodasī cidurvī ratnaṃ bhikṣanta savituḥ savāya
GV01rv_03_u:1101: RV_03.056.08.1{01} triruttamā dūṇaśā rocanāni trayo rājantyasurasya vīrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1102: RV_03.056.08.2{01} ṛtāvāna iṣirā dūḷabhāsastrirā divo vidathe santu devāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1103: RV_03.057.01.1{02} pra me vivikvānavidan manīṣāṃ dhenuṃ carantīṃ prayutāmagopām
GV01rv_03_u:1104: RV_03.057.01.2{02} sadyaścid yā duduhe bhūri dhāserindrastadagniḥ panitāro asyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1105: RV_03.057.02.1{02} indraḥ su pūṣā vṛṣaṇā suhastā divo na prītāḥ śaśayaṃ duduhre
GV01rv_03_u:1106: RV_03.057.02.2{02} viśve yadasyāṃ raṇayanta devāḥ pra vo 'tra vasavaḥ sumnamaśyām
GV01rv_03_u:1107: RV_03.057.03.1{02} yā jāmayo vṛṣṇa ichanti śaktiṃ namasyantīrjānate garbhamasmin
GV01rv_03_u:1108: RV_03.057.03.2{02} achā putraṃ dhenavo vāvaśānā mahaścaranti bibhrataṃ vapūṃṣi
GV01rv_03_u:1109: RV_03.057.04.1{02} achā vivakmi rodasī sumeke grāvṇo yujāno adhvare manīṣā
GV01rv_03_u:1110: RV_03.057.04.2{02} imā u te manave bhūrivārā ūrdhvā bhavanti darśatā yajatrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1111: RV_03.057.05.1{02} yā te jihvā madhumatī sumedhā agne deveṣūcyata urūcī
GV01rv_03_u:1112: RV_03.057.05.2{02} tayeha viśvānavase yajatrānā sādaya pāyayā cā madhūni
GV01rv_03_u:1113: RV_03.057.06.1{02} yā te agne parvatasyeva dhārāsaścantī pīpayad deva citrā
GV01rv_03_u:1114: RV_03.057.06.2{02} tāmasmabhyaṃ pramatiṃ jātavedo vaso rāsva sumatiṃ viśvajanyām
GV01rv_03_u:1115: RV_03.058.01.1{03} dhenuḥ pratnasya kāmyaṃ duhānāntaḥ putraścarati dakṣiṇāyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1116: RV_03.058.01.2{03} ā dyotaniṃ vahati śubhrayāmoṣasa stomo aśvināvajīgaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1117: RV_03.058.02.1{03} suyug vahanti prati vām ṛtenordhvā bhavanti pitareva medhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1118: RV_03.058.02.2{03} jarethāmasmad vi paṇermahīṣāṃ yuvoravaścakṛmā yātamarvāk
GV01rv_03_u:1119: RV_03.058.03.1{03} suyugbhiraśvaiḥ suvṛtā rathena dasrāvimaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokamadreḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1120: RV_03.058.03.2{03} kimaṅga vāṃ pratyavartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhurviprāso aśvinā purājāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1121: RV_03.058.04.1{03} ā manyethāmā gataṃ kaccidevairviśve janāso aśvinā havante
GV01rv_03_u:1122: RV_03.058.04.2{03} imā hi vāṃ goṛjīkā madhūni pra mitrāso na dadurusro agre
GV01rv_03_u:1123: RV_03.058.05.1{03} tiraḥ purū cidaśvinā rajāṃsyāṅgūṣo vāṃ maghavānā janeṣu
GV01rv_03_u:1124: RV_03.058.05.2{03} eha yātaṃ pathibhirdevayānairdasrāvime vāṃ nidhayo madhūnām
GV01rv_03_u:1125: RV_03.058.06.1{04} purāṇamokaḥ sakhyaṃ śivaṃ vāṃ yuvornarā draviṇaṃ jahnāvyām
GV01rv_03_u:1126: RV_03.058.06.2{04} punaḥ kṛṇvānāḥ sakhyā śivāni madhvā mademasaha nū samānāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1127: RV_03.058.07.1{04} aśvinā vāyunā yuvaṃ sudakṣā niyudbhiṣ ca sajoṣasā yuvānā
GV01rv_03_u:1128: RV_03.058.07.2{04} nāsatyā tiroahnyaṃ juṣāṇā somaṃ pibatamasridhā sudānū
GV01rv_03_u:1129: RV_03.058.08.1{04} aśvinā pari vāmiṣaḥ purūcīrīyurgīrbhiryatamānā amṛdhrāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1130: RV_03.058.08.2{04} ratho ha vām ṛtajā adrijūtaḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yāti sadyaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1131: RV_03.058.09.1{04} aśvinā madhuṣuttamo yuvākuḥ somastaṃ pātamā gataṃ duroṇe
GV01rv_03_u:1132: RV_03.058.09.2{04} ratho ha vāṃ bhūri varpaḥ karikrat sutāvato niṣkṛtamāgamiṣṭhaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1133: RV_03.059.01.1{05} mitro janān yātayati bruvāṇo mitro dādhāra pṛthivīmuta dyām
GV01rv_03_u:1134: RV_03.059.01.2{05} mitraḥ kṛṣṭīranimiṣābhi caṣṭe mitrāya havyaṃghṛtavajjuhota
GV01rv_03_u:1135: RV_03.059.02.1{05} pra sa mitra marto astu prayasvān yasta āditya śikṣati vratena
GV01rv_03_u:1136: RV_03.059.02.2{05} na hanyate na jīyate tvoto nainamaṃho aśnotyantito na dūrāt
GV01rv_03_u:1137: RV_03.059.03.1{05} anamīvāsa iḷayā madanto mitajñavo varimannā pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1138: RV_03.059.03.2{05} ādityasya vratamupakṣiyanto vayaṃ mitrasya sumatau syāma
GV01rv_03_u:1139: RV_03.059.04.1{05} ayaṃ mitro namasyaḥ suśevo rājā sukṣatro ajaniṣṭa vedhāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1141: RV_03.059.05.1{05} mahānādityo namasopasadyo yātayajjano gṛṇate suśevaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1142: RV_03.059.05.2{05} tasmā etat panyatamāya juṣṭamagnau mitrāya havirā juhota
GV01rv_03_u:1145: RV_03.059.07.1{06} abhi yo mahinā divaṃ mitro babhūva saprathāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1147: RV_03.059.08.1{06} mitrāya pañca yemire janā abhiṣṭiśavase
GV01rv_03_u:1151: RV_03.060.01.1{07} iheha vo manasā bandhutā nara uśijo jagmurabhi tāni vedasā
GV01rv_03_u:1152: RV_03.060.01.2{07} yābhirmāyābhiḥ pratijūtivarpasaḥ saudhanvanā yajñiyaṃ bhāgamānaśa
GV01rv_03_u:1153: RV_03.060.02.1{07} yābhiḥ śacībhiścamasānapiṃśata yayā dhiyā gāmariṇīta carmaṇaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1154: RV_03.060.02.2{07} yena harī manasā niratakṣata tena devatvam ṛbhavaḥ samānaśa
GV01rv_03_u:1155: RV_03.060.03.1{07} indrasya sakhyam ṛbhavaḥ samānaśurmanornapāto apaso dadhanvire
GV01rv_03_u:1156: RV_03.060.03.2{07} saudhanvanāso amṛtatvamerire viṣṭvī śamībhiḥ sukṛtaḥ sukṛtyayā
GV01rv_03_u:1157: RV_03.060.04.1{07} indreṇa yātha sarathaṃ sute sacānatho vaśānāṃ bhavathāsaha śriyā
GV01rv_03_u:1158: RV_03.060.04.2{07} na vaḥ pratimai sukṛtāni vāghataḥ saudhanvanā ṛbhavo vīryāṇi ca
GV01rv_03_u:1159: RV_03.060.05.1{07} indra ṛbhubhirvājavadbhiḥ samukṣitaṃ sutaṃ somamā vṛṣasvā gabhastyoḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1160: RV_03.060.05.2{07} dhiyeṣito maghavan dāśuṣo gṛhe saudhanvanebhiḥ saha matsvā nṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1161: RV_03.060.06.1{07} indra ṛbhumān vājavān matsveha no 'smin savane śacyā puruṣṭuta
GV01rv_03_u:1162: RV_03.060.06.2{07} imāni tubhyaṃ svasarāṇi yemire vratā devānāṃ manuṣaśca dharmabhiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1163: RV_03.060.07.1{07} indra ṛbhubhirvājibhirvājayanniha stomaṃ jariturupa yāhi yajñiyam
GV01rv_03_u:1165: RV_03.061.01.1{08} uṣo vājena vājini pracetā stomaṃ juṣasva gṛṇato maghoni
GV01rv_03_u:1166: RV_03.061.01.2{08} purāṇī devi yuvatiḥ purandhiranu vrataṃ carasi viśvavāre
GV01rv_03_u:1167: RV_03.061.02.1{08} uṣo devyamartyā vi bhāhi candrarathā sūnṛtā īrayantī
GV01rv_03_u:1168: RV_03.061.02.2{08} ā tvā vahantu suyamāso aśvā hiraṇyavarṇāṃ pṛthupājaso ye
GV01rv_03_u:1169: RV_03.061.03.1{08} uṣaḥ pratīcī bhuvanāni viśvordhvā tiṣṭhasyamṛtasya ketuḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1170: RV_03.061.03.2{08} samānamarthaṃ caraṇīyamānā cakramiva navyasyā vavṛtsva
GV01rv_03_u:1171: RV_03.061.04.1{08} ava syūmeva cinvatī maghonyuṣā yāti svasarasya patnī
GV01rv_03_u:1172: RV_03.061.04.2{08} svarjanantī subhagā sudaṃsā āntād divaḥ papratha ā pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1173: RV_03.061.05.1{08} achā vo devīmuṣasaṃ vibhātīṃ pra vo bharadhvaṃ namasā suvṛktim
GV01rv_03_u:1174: RV_03.061.05.2{08} ūrdhvaṃ madhudhā divi pājo aśret pra rocanā ruruce raṇvasandṛk
GV01rv_03_u:1175: RV_03.061.06.1{08} ṛtāvarī divo arkairabodhyā revatī rodasī citramasthāt
GV01rv_03_u:1176: RV_03.061.06.2{08} āyatīmagna uṣasaṃ vibhātīṃ vāmameṣi draviṇaṃ bhikṣamāṇaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1177: RV_03.061.07.1{08} ṛtasya budhna uṣasāmiṣaṇyan vṛṣā mahī rodasī ā viveśa
GV01rv_03_u:1178: RV_03.061.07.2{08} mahī mitrasya varuṇasya māyā candreva bhānuṃ vi dadhe purutrā
GV01rv_03_u:1179: RV_03.062.01.1{09} imā u vāṃ bhṛmayo manyamānā yuvāvate na tujyā abhūvan
GV01rv_03_u:1180: RV_03.062.01.2{09} kva tyadindrāvaruṇā yaśo vāṃ yena smā sinaṃ bharathaḥ sakhibhyaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1181: RV_03.062.02.1{09} ayamu vāṃ purutamo rayīyañchaśvattamamavase johavīti
GV01rv_03_u:1182: RV_03.062.02.2{09} sajoṣāvindrāvaruṇā marudbhirdivā pṛthivyā śṛṇutaṃ havamme
GV01rv_03_u:1183: RV_03.062.03.1{09} asme tadindrāvaruṇā vasu ṣyādasme rayirmarutaḥ sarvavīraḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1184: RV_03.062.03.2{09} asmān varūtrīḥ śaraṇairavantvasmān hotrā bhāratī dakṣiṇābhiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1185: RV_03.062.04.1{09} bṛhaspate juṣasva no havyāni viśvadevya
GV01rv_03_u:1191: RV_03.062.07.1{10} iyaṃ te pūṣannāghṛṇe suṣṭutirdeva navyasī
GV01rv_03_u:1193: RV_03.062.08.1{10} tāṃ juṣasva giraṃ mama vājayantīmavā dhiyam
GV01rv_03_u:1195: RV_03.062.09.1{10} yo viśvābhi vipaśyati bhuvanā saṃ ca paśyati
GV01rv_03_u:1197: RV_03.062.10.1{10} tat saviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi
GV01rv_03_u:1201: RV_03.062.12.1{11} devaṃ naraḥ savitāraṃ viprā yajñaiḥ suvṛktibhiḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1203: RV_03.062.13.1{11} somo jigāti gātuvid devānāmeti niṣkṛtam
GV01rv_03_u:1205: RV_03.062.14.1{11} somo asmabhyaṃ dvipade catuṣpade ca paśave
GV01rv_03_u:1211: RV_03.062.17.1{11} uruśaṃsā namovṛdhā mahnā dakṣasya rājathaḥ
GV01rv_03_u:1213: RV_03.062.18.1{11} gṛṇānā jamadagninā yonāv ṛtasya sīdatam
